attributes.title: This is HORRIBLE!!!!!
attributes.review:
This app is terrible it takes forever to download and I have a apple phone and one of the newer ones at that and it still took forever but that wasn’t even the worst part!!!!!😡 It took FOREVER to get the message to my number I was waiting HOURS  literal HOURS to get it to my phone!!!! And if that wasn’t bad enough when I Finally got onto the app it was boring as hell and didn’t help with me at all it makes me wonder if this is really Trumps app cause if it were it should be better!!!!!😡😡😡😡😡 It wouldn’t work with my internet even though my internet works for my Netflix and The Google😡😡😡😡😡 I am VERY disappointed in the app it should of been better. 

Love,

Linda❤️

attributes.title: Beyond Worst App I’ve ever used
attributes.review: So I went to set up an account on this app on my 69th birthday on the 69th day of the year because it was 4:20 pm. Very weird coincidence! But anyways with that backstory this app must be broken because all I saw after opening it was the picture of an old crusty rotten Cheeto! Extremely disturbing it scared me and my 69 children! Do not download! It endorses supersize me McDonald’s and the Karen’s.

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: Stinky app 😠 it made my eyes burn and I had to pour bleach on them

attributes.title: Viruses
attributes.review: So when I downloaded this app I got 3 viruses immediately it cost $20 to fix

attributes.title: OVERGROWN OOMPA LOOMPA’s app is 🗑
attributes.review: This is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded, i got corona!!🤮 I was just minding my business listening to our national anthem “Donald Trump is a white supremacist, if you vote for him again, you’re a white supremacist”, yk the truthful song of our nation, when his ugly face popped out of the screen. He violently spit on me and told me to go back to Mexico. I wasn’t even born there silly goose. As a result of his onion breath spit, i got the corona virus because he does not wear a mask. This is a very difficult subject to talk about, it scarred me for life, not only did i have to see his putrid face (which cause me to barf multiple times) but i also got Covid-19. I don’t think it’s safe for orange trolls to have apps so this should be removed immediately. Also he is racist, thank you and have a good night. #settleforbiden2020 #avoteforkanyeisavotefortrump #savebarron

attributes.title: Hacked all my info, started a virus
attributes.review: Honestly so disappointed, trump is supposed to stand for the people! But all my info was leaked and they hacked into my contacts texted everyone a huge virus link...we’re PAYING MONEY to get rid of this virus that is spread. My grandma doesn’t even know what to do with her phone anymore know that ads keep popping up. And the pornography....pornographic content? Seriously? My kids use this app!!!! ZERO stars if I could!!! BUG HACK AND VIRUS I DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Worst App, it changed my views
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I have ever used!! I honestly loved president trump before this, but the app was so utterly useless that I am considering voting for... Biden!! That’s right, you heard it hear folks, I’m voting on the side of the dems purely based off my experience with this piece of trash! Never again Trump!

attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP IT IS COMPLETELY USELESS
attributes.review: IT CLAIMED TO COME WITH THE RIGHT TO COTE BUT I DIDNT EVEN LET ME ACCESS THE APP, THE INCOMPLETE INFORMATION ON THE APP IN HORRIBLE, DO NOT INSTALL

attributes.title: Glitch when opening app
attributes.review: Whenever I try to open the app, there comes this picture of this guy who looks like he would could be casted as the actor playing Randall in Monsters Inc. He looks inept, weak, and honestly like he could use a shot of espresso. His eyes read pain and humiliation, almost as if he realized he is the glitch.

attributes.title: Don't download.
attributes.review: This was nice and all, but they deleted all of my important emails. And now I'm fired from my job for not replying to them. 1 star. Don't download, wouldn't reccomend it at all.
